website_summaries.verdict: Cockroach bait in easy-to-use bait station designed for home use.
pros: Effective control of cockroaches and their eggs with insecticide hydramethylnon in a "Clean Snap Technology" station that is ideal for placement in kitchens and bathrooms
Remains palatable to roaches for up to 6 months
More reasonably priced than other roach-control products

customer_reviews.title: Works Well in Kitchens for Roaches
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with small brown kitchen roaches in my apartment kitchen - probably coming from other apartments as I keep a clean house.....but that's apartment living. Happy to say these really solved the problem. I use three at a time - one behind the fridge, one under the sink, and one under the stove, and replace them every four months or so and haven't seen a roach for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: dragondancer

customer_reviews.title: Can't get in
customer_reviews.text: The holes for the roaches to access the bait are to small for them to get into. If I were to open it up further. I would be afraid my pats would be able to get to the bait.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Harpoon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: We have never had roaches before but with all the rain we have started seeing some. I've put these where we see them but haven't seen any improvement after a couple weeks and have gone on to other methods. I was very disappointed because I usually have good success with Ortho products.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Prust

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use .
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem big time. I’m using this now because it WORKS. I have gotten almost all of them with this stuff haven’t seen them since I started using this. Great product! Buying more.
customer_reviews.author: velva fenstmaker

customer_reviews.title: Might be ok if you have a few
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok but the hot shot liquid bait, works better. If you have just a few this would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jmasterson

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This product is great I had started seeing roaches I keep a clean house but some how they found they way in my house bought this product haven’t been seeing anymore critters will be buying again

customer_reviews.title: YES it works !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in apartments and someone moved in with their bugs I had pest control come out every 2 wks for 3 months then I ordered this BAM the creepy bastards are gone 5 days max and have not seen even 1 since almost 2 months so I highly recommend this product and of course AMAZON for free delivery

customer_reviews.title: didn't stick and does not work
customer_reviews.text: the roaches seem to have morphed into a different variety there are hundreds of babies so forget the egg killing properties. The number of roaches have tripled to that of what it was like before I put this stuff down. I think it may be feeding them!

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This one due the job. I been have this about Three weeks. I not see one at all. But been seen lots of died ones. this one is the best value for you money . it works
customer_reviews.author: maria rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: These things work wonders! We had such a problem with roaches in our apartment and now they almost always are caught in these traps.

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit all!
customer_reviews.text: This trap is for roaches the size of just hatched ones, nothing bigger could get in. I’ve never seen a bug that small so I guess the traps come in larger sizes! ?

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really make much difference
customer_reviews.text: Did not see much difference with the roaches. Not sure what the product was supposed to do but the roaches are back.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these , it appears to not have done the job. I don’t recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my other who lives in a high rise building. She has noticed a significant difference in her rodent problem. She states that she notices then every once in awhile.

customer_reviews.text: we saw no reduction in the population, though i placed several of these around the kitchen, especially where we see the most activity. we are not inundated, so i know its not a matter of just too many for them to work on.

customer_reviews.title: IT MUST WORK
customer_reviews.text: These convenient stations must work because I no long have those little roaches that had infested my apartment even when I kep things clean. Really see a roach, and when I do, it is staggering around on its last legs. I hate 'em, and this stuff surely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kleiber1

product_meta.title: Ortho 0464912 Defense Roach Bait-Kills Cockroaches & Eggs in Your Home, Palatable for 6 Months, Includes 8 Individual Stations
product_meta.description: Size:8 Individual StationsOrtho Home Defense Roach Bait features our patented Clean Snap Technology bait stations, which means no mess. When you hear that satisfying snap, the pre-filled station is ready for indoor roach killing action. Inside the station is a carefully crafted blend of food, water and insecticide. It's designed for unsuspecting cockroaches scavenging for their next meal. Once roaches are lured into the traps, the work is done. Roaches naturally do the rest of the work, spreading the bait to kill the many other roaches hiding in cracks and behind walls. Use in and around your home, wherever roaches are suspected or where they travel to find food, water, or shelter, including your kitchen, bathrooms, basement and garage. The roach bait stations remain attractive for 6 months, killing cockroaches at all stages of life, from eggs to adults. Place 1 station every 6 feet where roach activity is suspected for best results.
feature_bullets: Ortho Home Defense Roach Bait kills the cockroaches you see and those you don't around your house; roach bait stations are easy-to-use and remain palatable to roaches for up to 6 months of protection

KILL ROACHES & EGGS: Kill and control home-infesting cockroaches and the eggs they carry where they live, hide and breed; roaches are lured into traps to collect and spread bait to kill other roaches hiding in cracks and behind walls
CONTROL LARGE & SMALL ROACHES: Roach bait remains attractive for 6 months, killing roaches at all stages of life, from eggs to adults

NO MESS: The pre-filled, odorless roach bait stations can be used in and around your home, and can be used with confidence in your kitchen and bathroom where roaches can be found; our patented Clean Snap Technology means no mess

EASY-TO-USE ROACH KILLER: Control large and small cockroaches by placing bait stations where they travel to find food or water; for best results, place 1 station every 6 feet where roach activity is suspected

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars181 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
